description: Height represents a vertical distance (measured or estimated) between a low reference and a high reference.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Specifies the value of the height above or below ground.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Indicates the way the height has been captured.

properties.name: lowReference
properties.description: Indicates the low point used to calculate the value of the height.

properties.name: highReference
properties.description: Indicates the high point used to calculate the value of the height.
